body_html: I am adding this to our list of models that we would like to make easier in TensorFlow. I don't have any personal knowledge of the paper, but as far as your comment about having a trainable flag. It seems like you could multiply by a vector of 0's or 1' to mask the variable dynamically to achieve the same effect. Let me know if that would be sufficient? Thanks!

body: I am adding this to our list of models that we would like to make easier in TensorFlow. I don't have any personal knowledge of the paper, but as far as your comment about having a trainable flag. It seems like you could multiply by a vector of 0's or 1' to mask the variable dynamically to achieve the same effect. Let me know if that would be sufficient? Thanks!
